TypeSignature.Value: public delegate int Comparison<in T>(T x, T y);
.class public auto ansi sealed Comparison`1<- T> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Comparison(Of In T)(x As T, y As T) As Integer
generic <typename T> public delegate int Comparison(T x, T y);

span.span: The type of the objects to compare.

summary.span: 代表比較兩個相同類型之物件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that compares two objects of the same type.

returns.span: 帶正負號的整數，表示 和 的相對值，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of and , as shown in the following table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委派由方法多載的類別和方法多載的類別來排序的陣列或清單項目。This delegate is used by the method overload of the class and the method overload of the class to sort the elements of an array or list. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用委派與方法多載。The following code example demonstrates the use of the delegate with the method overload. 程式碼範例會定義具名字串的替代的比較方法`CompareDinosByLength`。The code example defines an alternative comparison method for strings, named `CompareDinosByLength`. 這個方法的運作方式如下： 第一次，針對測試比較元`null`，而且 null 的參考被視為小於一個非 null。This method works as follows: First, the comparands are tested for `null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null. 第二，進行比較的字串長度，以及較長的字串會視為大於。Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater. 第三，如果長度相等，則使用一般的字串比較。Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used. A的字串會建立並填入具有四個字串，不依特定順序。A of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 清單也會包含空字串和 null 參考。The list also includes an empty string and a null reference. 清單會顯示使用排序代表的泛型委派`CompareDinosByLength`方法，並顯示一次。The list is displayed, sorted using a generic delegate representing the `CompareDinosByLength` method, and displayed again. [!code-cpp[List\`1_SortComparison#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortComparison/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_SortComparison#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortComparison/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_SortComparison#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortComparison/vb/source.vb#1)] 下列範例會使用要排序之集合的項目委派`CityInfo`物件。The following example uses the delegate to sort the elements of a collection of `CityInfo` objects. `CityInfo` 是應用程式定義的類別，其中包含城市及其人口數目的相關資訊。`CityInfo` is an application-defined class that contains information about a city and its population. 此範例會定義三種方法， `CompareByName`， `CompareByPopulation`，和`CompareByNames`，可提供三種不同的方式排序`CityInfo`物件。The example defines three methods, `CompareByName`, `CompareByPopulation`, and `CompareByNames`, that offer three different ways of ordering the `CityInfo` objects. 每個方法指派給`comparison`引數的方法。Each method is assigned to the `comparison` argument of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Comparison\`1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.comparison`1/cs/comparisont1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Comparison\`1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.comparison`1/vb/comparisont1.vb#1)]
